Description: Mummy of a hawk with naturistically modelled head, with painted details, wrapped in narrow bandages of fine linen, arranged in a herring-bone pattern, foot damaged.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Walter B Emery
Curator's comments: Published in: S. Davies and H.S. Smith, The sacred animal necropolis at North Saqqara, MEES 73, 2005, p. 116
